materials.raw_text:

sourcing.instructions:

 Nickel: Obtain from chemical suppliers or metal distributors. 
 Phosphorus: Available from chemical supply companies; ensure it is in the correct form (red or black phosphorus). 
 Scandium: Source from rare earth metal suppliers or online marketplaces.
